title.value: Rheumatology: Rheumatoid Arthritis Clinical Content White Paper

identifier.identifierName: Contract: VA118-16-D-1008, Task Order (TO): VA-118-16-F-1008-0007, CLIN0005AP

title.value: Rheumatology: Rheumatoid Arthritis Documentation Template KNART Validation Report
2010 rheumatoid arthritis classification criteria: An american college of rheumatology/european league against rheumatism collaborative initiative

description.value: OBJECTIVE: The 1987 American College of Rheumatology (ACR; formerly, the American Rheumatism Association) classification criteria for rheumatoid arthritis (RA) have been criticized for their lack of sensitivity in early disease. This work was undertaken to develop new classification criteria for RA.

citation.value: Aletaha, D., Neogi, T., Silman, A. J., Funovits, J., Felson, D. T., Bingham, C. O., et al. (2010). 2010 rheumatoid arthritis classification criteria: An american college of rheumatology/european league against rheumatism collaborative initiative. Arthritis and Rheumatism, 62(9), 2569-2581. doi:10.1002/art.27584 [doi]

title.value: 2015 american college of rheumatology guideline for the treatment of rheumatoid arthritis

description.value: OBJECTIVE: To develop a new evidence-based, pharmacologic treatment guideline for rheumatoid arthritis (RA).

citation.value: Singh, J. A., Saag, K. G., Bridges, S. L., Akl, E. A., Bannuru, R. R., Sullivan, M. C., et al. (2016). 2015 american college of rheumatology guideline for the treatment of rheumatoid arthritis. Arthritis & Rheumatology (Hoboken, N.J.), 68(1), 1-26. doi:10.1002/art.39480 [doi]

name.value: Chief of Rheumatology, St Louis VA Medical Center (VAMC), 915 N. Grand, St. Louis, MO 63106 Professor of Medicine, Washington University School of Medicine

elm:annotation.a:s: x-ray hands, bilateral, to evaluate for possible rheumatoid arthritis

description.value: Please ask the patient the following questions:

textEquivalent.value: Answer Yes or No to the prompt

prompt.value: Is the duration of joint pain greater than 6 weeks?

textEquivalent.value: Answer Yes or No to the prompt

prompt.value: Are hands or wrists involved?

textEquivalent.value: Answer Yes or No to the prompt

prompt.value: Is morning stiffness present?

textEquivalent.value: Answer Yes or No to the prompt

prompt.value: Did the pain have a gradual onset?
Optional additional information

description.value: Please answer the following questions and provide any required additional details.

prompt.value: Are there greater than four joints involved?
Specific Joints Affected
Are there signs of joint inflammation (e.g., warmth, soft tissue swelling, or tenderness)?
Specific Joints Affected
Check all signs that are applicable.

description.value: Please answer the following questions and provide any required additional details.

prompt.value: Current or prior use of disease-modifying anti-rheumatic drugs?

additionalInstructions.value: Please provide details of this medication

prompt.value: Was there prior use of prednisone or other glucocorticoids?
Drug name
Date Initiated
If there are any other medication history details, please include them here
Obtain Rheumatoid Factor Results and Date
Obtain Anti-cyclic Citrullinated Peptide Antibody (ACPA/Anti-CCP) Result and date
Obtain Hepatitis C Antibody Screen Results and Date
Obtain Complete Blood Count Results and Date
Obtain Complete Metabolic Panel Results and Date
Obtain C-Reactive Protein Results and Date
Obtain Erythrocyte Sedimentation Rate Results and Date
Obtain Other Test
Obtain Hand Radiograph
